original_title: Daily Mirror News Editor injured during SJB protest
original_body_lines: Colombo, Jan 31 (Daily Mirror) - Yohan Perera, the News Editor of the Daily Mirror, sustained injuries yesterday during the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) protest when he was struck by a tear gas canister.
The demonstration took place in front of the Viharamadevi Park and the police, in accordance with a court order, blocked the road, restricting the protestors from exceeding their designated limits.
